title: Print, "Tradecard, Frederick Crace and Son, London", 1838–40
medium: Engraving, black ink on white cardboard
inscribed: Inscribed on plate, center: the inscription: Fredk Crace and Son,/ Decorators and Upholders/ To Her Majesty./ 14 Wigmore Street, Cavendish Square...
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Horizontal rectangle. Divided into two registers, upper register: royal coat of arms; lower register: text.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Tradecard, Frederick Crace and Son, London", 1838–40.
1838–40. Engraving, black ink on white cardboard. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1948-40-99.
